metadata.title: Compare Sheets | Free, Private & Open-Source | DiffSheets
metadata.description: Free online tool to compare Excel files, CSV spreadsheets, and more. 100% client-side, your data never leaves your browser.

upload.title: Compare Excel files and spreadsheets
upload.subtitle: Upload two files to see the differences. Your data stays in your browser.

matching.title: Matching Options
matching.description: Choose how rows are matched between files

position.label: By position
position.description: Row 1 matches row 1, row 2 matches row 2, etc.

keyColumn.label: By key column
keyColumn.description: Match rows by a unique identifier (ID, SKU, email)

lcs.label: Smart matching
lcs.description: Automatically detect reordered or moved rows

warnings.duplicates: This column has duplicate values - matching may be imprecise
warnings.empty: Many cells in this column are empty

ignoredColumns.label: Ignore columns
ignoredColumns.description: Select columns to exclude from comparison (e.g., auto-generated IDs, timestamps)

offline.title: 100% Offline
offline.description: Your data never leaves your browser. All processing happens locally.

formats.title: Multiple Formats
formats.description: Support for Excel (xlsx, xls), CSV, and ODS files.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Handle spreadsheets with thousands of rows efficiently.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: Free and open source. No sign-up required.

smart.title: Smart Detection
smart.description: Multiple comparison modes: row-by-row, key column, or intelligent LCS algorithm.

works.title: Works Offline
works.description: No internet needed after first load. Use it anywhere, anytime.

steps.step1Sub: Drag & drop or click to browse

free.question: Is DiffSheets free to use?
free.answer: Yes, DiffSheets is completely free to use. There are no hidden fees, subscriptions, or premium features locked behind a paywall.

safe.question: Is my data safe when using DiffSheets?
safe.answer: Absolutely. DiffSheets processes all files 100% client-side in your browser. Your spreadsheet data never leaves your computer or gets uploaded to any server.

formats.question: What file formats does DiffSheets support?
formats.answer: DiffSheets supports Excel files (.xlsx, .xls), CSV files, and OpenDocument Spreadsheets (.ods). You can compare files of the same or different formats.

large.question: Can I compare large Excel files?
large.answer: Yes, DiffSheets uses virtual scrolling technology to efficiently handle large spreadsheets with thousands of rows without performance issues.

how.question: How does DiffSheets compare spreadsheets?
how.answer: DiffSheets offers multiple comparison modes: position-based matching (row by row), key column matching (by a unique identifier), and intelligent LCS algorithm for best alignment detection.

cli.question: Can I use DiffSheets from the command line?
cli.answer: Yes! DiffSheets has an official MCP server that works with Claude Code and Claude Desktop. Install it with 'npx diffsheets-mcp' and compare spreadsheets directly from your terminal. Visit our MCP page for installation instructions.
